#summary Outputting formatted dates in your views

= Introduction =

The {{{outputDate}}} component will output a formatted Date object on your view.

= Attributes =

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *value* || yes || || Value expression corresponding to a Date object ||
|| *format* || no || %c || Date format to output the date into. See the  [http://php.net/manual/en/function.strftime.php PHP manual] for available format identifiers ||

= Examples =

See the [InputDate inputDate] component for examples.
